pipeline.description: Handles all customer login related storefront processes.

text-node.description: This is a central place to login a user from the login form.

decision-node.condition-key: typeof(TempCustomer) != 'undefined'&& TempCustomer != null && TempCustomer.profile != null && TempCustomer.profile.credentials.locked
typeof(TempCustomer) != 'undefined' && TempCustomer != null && TempCustomer.profile != null && TempCustomer.profile.credentials.locked

pipelet-node.custom-name: Notify that account is now locked.
Remove all existing payment instruments from the basket

text-node.description: This is the reentry point after an OAuth login, i.e., its URL is passed to the OAuth provider as the redirect URL.
Handles redirect after login. A start node is set with the following variables. - TargetPipeline is the location of the pipeline - TargetPipelineParams are any parameters that need to be sent

pipelet-node.custom-name: Remove all existing payment instruments from the basket

decision-node.condition-key: ('pageRetention' in CurrentSession.custom && CurrentSession.custom.pageRetention != null) ? CurrentSession.custom.pageRetention : false

text-node.description: Log customer out without redirecting to retain pdict variables for use on current page
This is a legacy customer and needs to reset their password.

Used in the following pipelines:
Account (Show, EditProfile) Address (List, Add, Edit, SetDefault, DeleteAddress) Cart (Login) COCustomer (Start) GiftRegistry (Start, AddProduct, Delete, Create) Order (History) PaymentsInstrument (List, Delete) PowerReviews (WriteReview) Wishlist (Show, Add)
Determine the base, dsc and flyercomdiv price books to apply to the user's session.
Determine if a discount model exists for customer. If coupon exists, apply it to basket.

key-binding.alias: dw.system.Logger.getLogger('DiscountModel').error('[AssignDiscountModel] Coupon Code [' + CouponCode + '] failed to be applied to the basket.')

text-node.description: This pipeline assigns the discount model and dynamic pricebooks to the customer's session
SetDefaultShipAddress - will be get called when "Active Shipping Address ID" is unavailable in Customer Address.
